resources.string: The group can be a box, and apply dimensions. Each item member can attach just like it does with other layouts. Group can also be used to hide/display itself and its members

Guidelines are like poles which are included in contraintLayouts but whose job is only to serve as a vertical or horizontal reference. Any other elements can constraint to them. In this case two textvVews, and a skinny view, acting as a line, are constrained to the vertical guideline
